isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - ROCKWELL TANDEM AXLE FORWARD REAR DRIVE UNITS - CLEAN AND INSPECT - CLEANING PARTS WITH A ROUGH FINISH

svcproc.title: CLEANING PARTS WITH A ROUGH FINISH

step1.para: Parts with a rough finish can be cleaned with cleaning solvent or in a hot solution tank with a weak alkaline solution.
Parts must remain in hot solution tanks until completely cleaned and heated.

warning.para: Be careful when using hot solution tanks and alkaline solutions. Follow the instructions supplied by the alkaline manufacturer for safe use to avoid serious personal injury.

step1.para: After cleaning, the parts must be washed with water until the alkaline solution is removed.
